sent.orig: The blame, if there is any blame, is mine, not yours.
sent.trans: 要是有什么过失的话，其实在我，不在你。

sent.orig: I do not blame you, I blame myself.
sent.trans: 我不责怪你，我责怪我自己。

sent.orig: It's always better to blame the system and fix it rather than blame the person.
sent.trans: 责备一个系统并修改它总是比责备一个人好。

sent.orig: Blame, but also can blame myself as cold branches would pick, ultimately, lonely sandbar cold habitat.
sent.trans: 怨哉，却也只能怪我自己拣尽寒枝不肯栖，终究寂寞沙洲冷。

sent.orig: She did not blame Minnie, she did not blame Hanson very much.
sent.trans: 她不怪敏妮，也不很怪汉生。
